title: Rusted Round
desc:
Post 71
- When this round is fired for the first time, it doesn't actually leave the Shotgun. It stays in the Shotgun until shot again.
- AKA, on the first time shooting, it works like a Blank <:blank:1240849815823450112>, and puts itself back into the top of the Shotgun.
- On the second time shooting, it works like a Live <:live:1240849786702401566> and leaves the Shotgun.
- **Safe** on the first shot.
